body_html: Are you trying to do inference or training? If you are just trying to do inference, then you should really find out why your session is invoking ops that are called "gradients/...". It is far easier to figure out why that is happening than to add ops, and it probably will be important for performance.

body: Are you trying to do inference or training? If you are just trying to do inference, then you should really find out why your session is invoking ops that are called "gradients/...". It is far easier to figure out why that is happening than to add ops, and it probably will be important for performance.
